SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Prepare options for message queue/topic actions :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Queue' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE# = 'jms-queue' :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Topic' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE# = 'jms-topic' : ELSE : PRINT Unknown resource type: &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# : EXIT 1 : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = 'Managed Domain' : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE# = '' : PRINT Profile must not be empty : EXIT 1 : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD# = '/profile=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE#/subsystem=messaging/hornetq-server=default' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_COMMAND# = '&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE# --profile=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE#' : ENDIF :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD# = '/subsystem=messaging/hornetq-server=default' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_COMMAND# = '&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE#' :ENDIF
! prepare queue/topic params :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_QUEUE_PARAMS# = ''
! build property string, command string :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Queue' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_QUEUE_PARAMS# = '--queue-address=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# --entries=&UC4RB_JBOSS_JNDI_NAME#' :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Topic' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_QUEUE_PARAMS# = '--topic-address=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# --entries=&UC4RB_JBOSS_JNDI_NAME#' : ENDIF :ENDIF
! prepare address-setting params :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = ''
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_DLA# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#, 'dead-letter-address=&UC4RB_JBOSS_DLA#,') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_MAX_ATTEMPTS# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#, 'max-delivery-attempts=&UC4RB_JBOSS_MAX_ATTEMPTS#,') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_RE_DELAY# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#, 'redelivery-delay=&UC4RB_JBOSS_RE_DELAY#,') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_EXPIRY# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#, 'expiry-address=&UC4RB_JBOSS_EXPIRY#,') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SIZE_MAX# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#, 'max-size-bytes=&UC4RB_JBOSS_SIZE_MAX#,') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SIZE_PAGE# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#, 'page-size-bytes=&UC4RB_JBOSS_SIZE_PAGE#,') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SIZE_PAGE_CACHE# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#, 'page-max-cache-size=&UC4RB_JBOSS_SIZE_PAGE_CACHE#,') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_FULL_POLICY# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#, 'address-full-policy=&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_FULL_POLICY#,') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_REDIS_DELAY# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#, 'redistribution-delay=&UC4RB_JBOSS_REDIS_DELAY#,') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#) : SET &UC4RB_LENGTH# = &UC4RB_LENGTH# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_JBOSS_ADDR_SETTING_PARAMS#, 1, &UC4RB_LENGTH#) :ENDIF
